name: Nova: Cloudwalker's Tale
description:
Nova: Cloudwalker's Tale is a charming puzzle game where you move, combine and walk on clouds to gather star shards and make your way through the skies.

Key features

  • Explore over 70 levels carefully crafted to challenge you with unique puzzle mechanics.
  • Make use of 4 types of clouds: rearrange and merge them to make your way across the skies.

  • Travel over 4 unique dreamlike regions as The Cloudwalker in your journey to reunite the lost star shards.
  • Rich, atmospheric presentation of a devastated fantasy land, with stunning visuals and evocative music.
  • Enjoy non-linear exploration of a world full of mystery and legends, through wordless storytelling.
